overview: A serial start-up executive in the kids and e-learning space, Heather has led product initiatives at several interesting companies including Everloop, LiveScribe, Smarty Ants, and Smarty Card (no relation!) Heather was the first employee at Smarty Card and was instrumental in the company winning the People’s Choice Award at Demo 2009. Earlier in her career, Heather worked on LeapFrog’s internet products. Heather’s specialty is herding engineers and making learning fun. She has an MA in Education from the University of San Francisco.
